title: Activists Around the World: Melissa Cristina Marquez
itunes:title: Activists Around the World: Melissa Cristina Marquez
description:
Marine biologist Melissa Cristina Marquez's enthusiasm and passion around sharks is infectious and has rightfully earned her some recognition. We look into her efforts in fostering understanding around sharks, and also talk about crocodile bites. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
